title: [Security] Overly broad exception catching hides critical errors

acceptance_criteria_met: MemoryError and RecursionError propagate instead of being caught
ValueError, OSError, json.JSONDecodeError are still caught explicitly
New tests verify critical exceptions propagate
risks_identified: None identified - changes only affect exception handling for serious errors

approach: Changed 'except Exception' to 'except (ValueError, OSError, json.JSONDecodeError)' to allow critical exceptions like MemoryError and RecursionError to propagate for proper error handling and debugging.
